Detailed Description

The LinuxTuples implementation of the Cowichan problem set.

Member Function Documentation

void CowichanLinuxTuples::chain ( bool  use_randmat,
bool  use_thresh 
) [protected]

Runs the cowichan problem set, chained together.

Parameters:
use_randmat true: generate a random matrix. false: use a window of the mandelbrot set.
use_thresh true: use image thresholding for int->bool. false: use invasion percolation for int->bool.

Reimplemented from Cowichan.

const int CowichanLinuxTuples::NUM_WORKERS = 2 [static]

The number of worker processes to spawn.

The port number the LinuxTuples server is running on.

The host where the LinuxTuples server can be found.
